Experienced
and Up-To-Date

Since 1996

We are celebrating 25 years of excellence in manufacturing and supplying medical devices worldwide.
Nowadays, Medical Device Industry is challenged by a pandemic, economic and complex regulatory environment: we meet the market’s demand which is supplied with qualitative and affordable products.

Following the Medical Device Industry Best Practice

We pursue the highest Quality, Safety and Performance of our products.
We comply with the rigorous regulations set by the European Union and follow the global Medical Device Industry Best Practice.
